title: Drawing, "Moldings and Three Triangular Lunettes", late 18th century
medium: Pen and ink over charcoal on heavy paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Framing of field with spherical triangles below; those with bases below decorated with scenes of playing children; others with candelabra. Verso: same motif sketched upon roughly squared ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Moldings and Three Triangular Lunettes", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Pen and ink over charcoal on heavy paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1664.
